name: Death Is Real.
description:
Death Is Real is a puzzle game about avoiding death. Place objects in front of the protagonist to help him escape the personification of Death. Reach the end of the level without running into Death or any other deadly hazards.

Controls: 

Left Mouse Button - drag and place down objects from your inventory.

R - Restart Level

This game and all of its assets were made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.
